title: Log in to Pokebattler

meta.description: Pokebattler stores your Pokemon Go Pokemon in its Pokedex for fast raid counters and more!

description: Create a free account to access your Pokebox and get free personalized counters!
explanation: Pokebattler does not and can not log in to your Pokemon Go account. We do not connect to Niantic servers in any way. Pokebattler only uses this login to know who you are across all your devices. You can login on your phone or tablet or computer and see all the Pokemon that you have entered into our site. We do not share your information or use it for marketing purposes or any other way.
privacy: For more information, see our privacy policy

login.autoCreate: Authenticating will automatically create your Pokebattler account and log you in
login.patreonDescription: Pokebattler now supports direct Stripe subscriptions! We highly encourage current Patreon subscribers to migrate to the new subscription plans. Users from countries that Stripe does not support such as Brazil and Mexico as well as users who want to pay through Paypal should continue to use Patreon.
login.loginReason: Log in to enable cross device and platform functionality for your account on the Pokebattler.com website and with third party apps such as discord bots
login.emailReason: Pokebattler uses your email address for account linking and customer support purposes only.

success.title: Logged in Successfully
success.fromApi: $t(login.success.title)! Please wait a moment to continue.

link.title: Connect Your Social Logins
link.description: You can link your Pokebattler account with multiple login methods. When you perform this action, the account you attempt to link to will be merged into the current account. Make sure you are logged in with the account you wish to keep!
link.allLinked: Wow! You have linked all your accounts. Congratulations on becoming a Pokebattler Account Master!

details.description: Your trainer information below will be used to customize the site and will be displayed to other users.

raidParty.title: Raid Party Settings
raidParty.description: Settings for the Pokebattler Raid Party App.

loggedIn.title: Public Profile
loggedIn.description: You have successfully logged in. Fill out your trainer information below, then click on the Pokebox to add your Pokemon for custom results. Then create Battle Parties for use for custom raid results.

meta.description: Store your Pokemon Go User Info and Pokemon.

discordLink.instructions: To link your discord account, log out and log back in using the discord login option and the email address tied to this account.
discordLink.linkAccounts: Link your Discord account to this Pokebattler account to enable the Pokebattler Raid Network
discordLink.error: Having issues linking? Email admin@pokebattler.com both of your Pokebattler user ids.

logout.title: Logged out

meta.description: You have successfully logged out of Pokebattler.

logout.description: You have been successfully logged out. Come back later on any device and your Pokebox will be there waiting for you!

delete.title: Remove your Pokebattler account
delete.privacy: Pokebattler protects your privacy. The only personal data collected for your account is your email address. We only use the email address for account support and linking accounts, never for spam emails.
delete.description: Not using your account and never coming back? You can delete your account from the Pokebattler servers. This will NOT affect your actual Pokemon Go account because we aren't Niantic
delete.confirmation: Account removal is permanent and can not be undone! Are you sure?
delete.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. You can recreate an empty account by logging back in again.

subscribed.title: Thank You For Your Support

meta.description: Pokebattler is made free to use for all through the generous subscriptions of people just like you! Your subscription disables advertisements and unlocks powerful features to help you beat that raid boss or your friends in pvp!

subscribed.patreon: Patreon subscribers are encouraged to switch to the Stripe based options below for lower prices and better support.  You may email admin@pokebattler.com to receive a coupon applied to your subscription when you switch. Coupon amount will be based on your remaining Patreon subscription. Users in countries Stripe does not support such as Brazil and Mexico as well as users who wish to pay using Paypal should continue using Patreon.
subscribed.chargeAmount: You will be immediately charged a prorated amount of ${{chargeAmount}} immediately. The full amount will be charged at the beginning of each billing cycle.

duringTrial.description: During your trial, you may change your subscription freely

downgradeSubscription.description: Downgrade your subscription at the end of your current subscription.

subscription.title: Subscribe to Pokebattler

meta.description: Pokebattler is made free to use for all through the generous subscriptions of people just like you! Subscribing disables advertisements and unlocks powerful features to help you beat that raid boss or your friends in pvp!

app.description: Pokebattler subscriptions are connected to your account and provide enhanced functionality and more detailed analytics across all your devices, app, mobile web and desktop.

support.description: Having problems with your subscription?  Pokebattler subscriptions are connected to the account you were logged in with at purchase time. Contact support with your old and new Pokebattler ids to merge your accounts

restore.noneFound: No prior purchases on this Apple Id

app.freeTrial: Your account will be charged after the free trial period ends. You may cancel your subscription before the free trial ends to avoid any charges.

subscription.paymentRequestDescription: One Click Subscribe is supported on most mobile devices. You can also choose to enter in your information below instead
subscription.name: First and Last Name
subscription.description: Your credit card information is securely handled by Stripe and never sent to Pokebattler. Stripe processes your subscriptions and informs Pokebattler of your subscription status.
subscription.multiMonth: Save with a multi month plan!
subscription.requiresLogin: You Must Log In To Subscribe
subscription.ibanDescription: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you are authorizing Pokebattler.com and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with those instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
subscription.notNeccessary: The following fields are usually not required. You only need to fill these out if your payment is declined.

1month.title: 1 month - ${{intervalCost}}/mo
1month.subtitle: You will be charged ${{cost}} each month after your {{trialPeriodDays}} day free trial.
1month.discount: Save by selecting a multi month plan
1month.monthlyPrice: Buy a single month. Save by selecting a multi month plan!

3month.title: 3 months - ${{intervalCost}}/mo
3month.subtitle: You will be charged ${{cost}} every 3 months after your {{trialPeriodDays}} day free trial.
3month.monthlyPrice: Buy 3 months upfront for {{currency}}{{intervalCost}} per month.

6month.title: 6 months - ${{intervalCost}}/mo
6month.subtitle: You will be charged ${{cost}} every 6 months after your {{trialPeriodDays}} day free trial.
6month.monthlyPrice: Buy 6 months upfront for {{currency}}{{intervalCost}} per month.

upsell.rankingByType: Subscribers have access to ranking features that are too expensive to give to everyone including party power, ranking by type and primal boosts!

transaction.restore: Restoring your subscriptions. This may take some time

error.playLogin: Could not complete transaction. Please log in to Google Play and try again
error.unknown: Could not complete transaction! Please contact admin@pokebattler.com
error.verification: Could not verify transaction! Please contact admin@pokebattler.com
error.restore: Could not restore transactions! Please contact admin@pokebattler.com
error.transactionRestore: Can not apply transaction. Please log in on original account or contact admin@pokebattler.com

roles.title: Account Information
roles.heading: Current Benefits
roles.description: Contribute to Pokebattler for premium benefits including a larger Pokebox and an ad free experience. Pokebattler is only possible by the generous support of people just like you, contributing to the increasing server costs of hosting this site.
roles.thanks: Thank you for supporting Pokebattler! Your contributions are greatly appreciated.

stripe.title: Website Subscription
stripe.manageSubscription: Manage this Stripe subscription on the website.

trialing.title: Free Trial Period
trialing.description: Your Pokebattler subscription comes with a trial period to allow you the option to cancel with no charge if you are not happy with the service.
trialing.cancelled: Your Pokebattler subscription was cancelled. Why not try us again?

active.title: Active Membership
active.description: Your Pokebattler membership is started.  Your membership is set to renew at {{currentPeriodEnd}}
active.cancelled: Your Pokebattler membership will cancel as of {{currentPeriodEnd}}. Please continue to enjoy your subscription until then!

incomplete.title: Incomplete Membership
incomplete.description: Your Pokebattler membership requires action by you to complete.  You need to confirm your subscription with your payment provider.

incomplete_expired.title: Incomplete Membership
incomplete_expired.description: Your Pokebattler membership required action by you to complete but that time has passed. You will need to subscribe again.

past_due.title: Past Due Membership
past_due.description: Your Pokebattler membership did not go through.  You will need to update your payment information and subscribe again

canceled.title: Canceled Membership
canceled.description: Your Pokebattler membership was canceled.  Your last membership date was {{currentPeriodEnd}}.

sponsor.title: Support {{app}}

meta.description: Assign a percentage of your Pokebattler membership to {{app}}

sponsor.description: Pokebattler now offers a way to sponsor selected Pokebattler partners who provide valuable services for the community. Pokebattler hopes you consider supporting these creators to help keep the community alive and thriving

how.title: How it works
how.description: If you choose to sponsor a creator, they will receive a percentage of your subscription before any taxes, fees or discounts.  The higher your subscription level, the higher the percentage.  At the beginning of each month, Pokebattler cuts a check to each creator based on the active subscriptions for the month.  The creators are provided a list of sponsors along with a portion of their public profile information and subscription level.
how.description2: This sponsorship does not cost anything extra and  does not change the terms of your Pokebattler subscription in any way.

legal.title: Legal
legal.description: Sponsoring a 3rd party authorizes Pokebattler to share public profile data with that third party including user id, trainer name and discord name as well as non-public data regarding subscription dates and levels. Email address and account ids are not shared with sponsored creators. Sponsorship applies to Stripe, Apple and Google subscriptions only, Patreon subscriptions are not included.

sponsor.notSubscribed: You are not currently subscribed to Pokebattler. You will need to subscribe in order to support {{app}}

pokenav.description: PokeNav is a Pokemon Go Discord Bot for raiding, trading and more. It provides Pokebattler counters and raid parties to Discord servers
pokenav.quote: Sponsoring PokeNav helps support its development and cover it’s ongoing costs
pokenav.thanks: Thank you for sponsoring PokeNav! Your contribution helps cover its ongoing costs and development.
pokenav.name: IVpips

clembotdark.description: Clembot Dark is a Pokemon Go Discord Bot for raiding
clembotdark.quote: Pokebattler is an amazing resource to all your answers related to raiding (customizable per user). Pokebattler integration with Clembot is aimed to bring all that information on discord servers as well, so excited!
clembotdark.thanks: Thank you so much for supporting Clembot.
clembotdark.name: B!

pvpoke.description: Pvpoke is open-source tool for simulating, ranking, and building teams for Pokemon GO PvP (player versus player) battles
pvpoke.quote: I'm very excited to partner with Pokebattler to help bring the best of battle simulation! With a Pokebattler subscription, you'll be able to store hundreds of your PvP Pokemon to analyze on Pokebattler and PvPoke.com.
pvpoke.thanks: Thanks so much for subscribing and for your support for PvPoke! I'll see you in the arena!
pvpoke.name: Matt

nexus.description: Nexus is a discord bot for coordinating raids, trades and getting useful information for Pokémon Go
nexus.quote: By sponsoring Nexus you are helping to cover costs as the application grows
nexus.thanks: Thank you for sponsoring Nexus! You make it possible to keep the bot up and running
nexus.name: 10Criz

minpoke.description: Minpoke is a Pokémon Go website that provides is a discord bot for coordinating raids, trades and getting useful information for Pokémon Go
minpoke.quote: By sponsoring Minpoke you are helping to cover costs as the application grows
minpoke.thanks: Thank you for sponsoring Minpoke! You make it possible to keep the website up and running
minpoke.name: Minpoke
